root: ^Ah. Hello. Welcome. We've been expecting you.
^Uh... hi. Why are you wearing that?
^A store manager's got to get in tune with the vibe, don't they?
^I'm Manuel. I'm the boss of this store.
^Thanks for getting here early. We have a lot to go over.
^And I'm glad you've already gotten yourself into the holiday spirit!
^I just like wearing a witch hat, okay?
^Here. Put this on. I'll show you around real quick.
